transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Naveen ji namaskar.
Executive: Ji namaskar.
Customer: Rahul baat kar raha tha. Message kiya tha aapko whatsapp pe bhi.
Executive: Achha, call kar raha hu main aapko.
Customer: Kar lo koi baat nahi, main recorded line pe call thi na ye wali.
Executive: Achha, koi baat nahi.
Customer: Abhi ho free thoda sa agar connect kar pao main actually kya hai by lead main aapka dekh raha tha. Irrelevant mark nahi kar rahe the na irrelevant ke liye.
Executive: Wo tha baki irrelevant to maine kaha main aapka kiya hua hai ya chaho to samne se bhi dekh lo main sir connect hoke.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Kya haal hai sir, namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar sir, namaskar.
Executive: Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Badhiya badhiya sir Naveen ji thoda sa kal thoda sa gussa kar rahe the by lead ko leke kal sham ko unka call aaya tha.
Executive: Aap ek baar 46 46 pe connect karenge please?
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: Mere wale number pe connect kijiye please 4646.
Executive: Achha aapke wale number pe, aapke wala number to hai mere paas ye wala 648 na?
Customer: 4646.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not marking irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer received a call from Naveen regarding buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect and show the process.

- Executive asked the customer to connect on 4646.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will connect on the provided number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant leads, call, connect
